title: Perma banned for suspicious activity and can't log into support or forum pages.
body:
Hello all.
This is my son's account. I have asked him to log into his forums account and sit next to my while I type this so that he approves. (Thank god he  agreed!)
My account is suspended for "suspicious activity, and malicious changes." Which I made. I understand why they may see this as I have made a lot of changes on the account and changed the country I access it from. I have also changed my ISP which changes our IP address. I can see why they are a little suspicious about the access to my account. But they keep asking me to prove it's mine. I have proven its's mine and all was good, they unbanned me. Now it's banned again. untill the year 2100. (2100 ban is security related im very sure. It said so on google anyway.) 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/h33LTFGx-permanently-suspended-for-suspicious-activity
Is my ticket made from my forums account; however I am not able to login to my forums account OR riot support account anymore because It says wrong password. I have made sure it's 100% the correct password and even did the forgot my password a few times.. Still can't get it. I know I have the right username, pass, and region. 
I am making this post because I am unable to access my support, forums, and league accounts. I need some help. I have already proved it's my account. I appreciate them caring but this is a little ridiculous. It's like the government kicking a family out of their house that they own outright and saying "provide us proof you paid for the house" and we will let you back in. Untill then you're living on the streets. and then not accepting the proof the family gives them. That's what it seems like to me anyway. :(
I'm so stick! Please take a look at the link to the forums post above; I will have to reply using my sons account and get him to login and sit next to me while I type these posts. (Not going to be a parent who asks their kids for their password for everything and controls it, just me though! I prefer him to be happy and let me type this rather than forcing him to let me.)

So I would like some help with my account { Reported4verbal } no "}{" in the name. 
Please help me. I'm really annoyed at this point :(.

replies.body:
Hey Nicole27,

You can submit an [Account Recovery Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154) without logging into the Support site. Please follow all of the steps below to regain control of your League of Legends account and reverse any unwanted actions that the individual who compromised your account may have taken:

1. Run a complete anti-virus scan on your computer and remove any malware that is detected. If you don't have an anti-virus program, I recommend downloading either [**MalwareBytes Free**](https://www.malwarebytes.org/mwb-download/) or [**ESET NOD32 with a free 30 day trial**](http://download.eset.com/special/live-installer/us/eset_nod32_antivirus_live_installer.exe). Either or should be able to get the job done. 

2. Once the scans have run and any detections are removed, change any accounts/passwords that you believe may have been compromised. This may include your email account(s) and League of Legends account (if you still have access to it; if not, skip to the "Submitting a ticket" step). You can change your League of Legends password by going to the [**League of Legends account area**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) in the top-right corner of this page. Click on your summoner name, and select "Settings". In the box that comes up, click "Change Password" and follow said steps. (Make sure that your email account is secure before doing this step, as a confirmation email will be sent to the corresponding email account.)

3. Now that your accounts are secure, it's time to contact Riot Games Player Support to deal with the unauthorized actions on your account and/or recovering your account. 


To contact Riot Games Player Support, you'll need to [**submit a ticket on the Riot Games Support website**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154). In the ticket, please submit all the requested information along with whatever information you can provide about your situation: 

> ##**[NOTE: DO *NOT* POST THE INFORMATION ON THE BOARDS. SUBMIT THEM IN YOUR TICKET!]**

 Lastly, to increase your chances of a quick resolution to your request, follow the tips below the best that you can:
 
1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Player Support Specialist's request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue.

2. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. (They're doing their best to help you!)

3. Try not create a new ticket or respond to an existing ticket before a Player Support Specialist has had the chance to review your request. New tickets/replies may bump your ticket back to the bottom of the queue, thus increasing the amount of time before a Player Support Specialist is able to review your ticket.  
 
I know that there are quite a bit of steps listed above, so if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Best of luck!

Please visit the [Protecting Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and [Recovering Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) articles for more information.

-DTN

You don't have to login to the support site to see ticket responses/reply to tickets. Be sure to check your spam folder in your email. You'll always receive a "Ticket Received" email and any responses to the ticket will be sent to the email associated with the ticket. To reply to a ticket all you have to do is reply to the email.

I'm afraid we can't help you any further, we're very limited as volunteers. It's up to support from here to help you.
